### Mr. Masumbuko Semba

![](resources/semba.png)

**Role**: Mentor

Semba works at the [Nelson Mandela African Institution of Science and Technology]{style="background: #433E49; color: #ABDFF1"}. He is an expert in data science and spatial analytics, web app development, typset and layout of printing material and graphic designer


:::

::: {.column width="50%"}

### Ms. Nyamisi Peter

![](resources/michi-ofisi.png)

**Role**: Mentor

Nyamisi works at [University of Dar es Salaam]{style="background: #433E49; color: #ABDFF1"}. She is phytoplankton exeprt using earth observation data and automate data acquisation, process, analyse, and report in R

### Mr. Barakael Matulu

![](resources/barakael.png)

**Role**: Mentee

Barakael works on the USAID Heshimu Bahari Project. He is an aquatic ecologist with interests in marine resources management and climate change issues. Recently, he has also developed an interest in automating data acquisition, processing, analysis, and reporting in R, as well as graphic design.
